## Datal Load
```{r}
read_csv("sentimentdataset.csv") |> select(-(1:2)) -> dfSocial
```

```{r}
dfSocial$Text |>
  parallelSentiment() -> llamaSentiment

llamaSentimentClean <- case_when(
  grepl(llamaSentiment, pattern = "Positive") ~ "Positive",
  grepl(llamaSentiment, pattern = "Negative") ~ "Negative",
  grepl(llamaSentiment, pattern = "Other") ~ "Other",
  T ~ "Error"
  
)

llamaSentimentClean |> table()
dfSocial$llama <- llamaSentimentClean

dfSocial |>
  filter(Sentiment != llama)
```
